post-title1-list1: Salaries that are above the industry average.
post-title1-list2: A technical atmosphere with a top engineer culture, where engineers are Apache committers and PMCs.
post-title1-list3: Normal domestic five-percent insurance and pension benefits.
post-title2-list1: A work environment where career and life can be balanced.
post-title2-list2: Age is just a number. Whether you have just graduated from college or already have a family, we are here only for what you can do.
post-title2-list3: We're a distributed company with employees in 6 cities across China, and we do all of our collaboration through GitHub, Slack, Google Docs, and Tencent Meetings.
